snippet: A holistic planning approach can help reduce portfolio risk and improve returns by showing where tweaks can be made to provide the best mix of holdings, according to an investment management study.
abstract: Retirement advisers are increasingly recommending that retirement planning factor in accumulated assets that may not be fully enlisted in calculating future income; one such asset is a home with substantial equity, which could be sold in or near retirement, generating income that can be invested if it is replaced by a smaller or cheaper home.
lead_paragraph: A holistic planning approach can help reduce portfolio risk and improve returns by showing where tweaks can be made to provide the best mix of holdings, according to an investment management study.

headline.main: Exploring Easier Ways to Save More and Cut Risk
